document.full_text: in a news conference, president dmitri a. medvedev of russia left one crucial question unanswered: will he run for re-election, or make way for prime minister vladimir v. putin?
document.title: key question is left open as medvedev faces media
lines_and_colors: in a news conference, president dmitri a. medvedev of russia left one crucial question unanswered: will he run for re-election, or make way for prime minister vladimir v. putin?
